name: One Chance (itch) (Yannick)
description:
Hello everyone

This Game was a group project with two other students.

The goal of this game was to work and organize in a group.

My part in the group was to oversee and lead the project. The idea for this project was chosen after a pitching the idea in front of the other students.

The level design and a part of the programming was also a part from me. As long, another team member would not out commented my code ;)

The Game:

You just have one chance to solve the riddles and get out. But why are you here? What happened to you? How did you get there?

There are a lot of traps, wich end fatally for you. And the name of the Game is what you get.

Just one Chance.

Inspired from horror classic Movie Saw.
